name: Inventory Management System with Multi-Client Support
description: Built a multi-client inventory management system with real-time transactions, secure Bcrypt authentication, concurrency control, role-based access, and  transaction handling for data integrity.

name: Podcanotes: your podcast note-taker
description: Developed a full-stack note-taking web app with user authentication, CRUD operations, PostgreSQL integration showcasing skills in relational databases.

name: Cloned Voice Story Generator
description: Developed an AI-powered storytelling tool that transforms user prompts into narrated audio with cloned voices and context-aware background sounds, supporting multiple languages and customizable parameters like speed, pitch, and pauses.

name: Mood-Melody
description: Built a Streamlit app that detects emotions via webcam (DeepFace) and generates dynamic, mood-enhancing music MusicGen); integrated Spotify API for personalized, mood-based song recommendations with optional mood transitions.

name: Containerized a Go-based URL Shortener
description: Built and containerized a Go-based URL shortener using Docker with multi-stage builds, reducing image size from 1.74 GB to 30 MB.

name: Portfolio website
description: Built my own portfolio website using Next app
